name: Starfighter Idol: Ada
description:
Playable from start to finish, this is more like an incomplete demo of this game I've been working for the past few days.

  • Objective: destroy all enemy forces
  • Your allies are dumb but are excellent for soaking up bullets
  • There is no friendly fire, but allies still block your bullets
  • Just like Asteroids, you can fly in any direction and the map will tile infinitely

Still needs a couple more things before I can call the demo complete:

  • Menus, settings and progression

Controls:

  • W - Move forward
  • LMB - Shoot
  • Mouse wheel - Change weapons
